Topic.Title: A question about music/sound in Gamebook

Posts.EditableText:
Well, I just started doing some things in Quest and I must say that it is an amazing program.
Back to topic, i have a problem:
   (example)
Im in page 1 with music
I go to page 2 (music still on)
but if i return to page 1 the music starts again D:   

How can make it so that the music doesnt stop until i make a script for it?
